channel.title: HELP ME please
channel.description: Okay so i made a diff home for my server and i jus found out i had to re add the portals so im doing that put i want too put npc's beside the portals too let players know where the portals take u can any1 help me????

item.title: HELP ME please
item.dc:creator: @razjazjoe razjazjoe
item.description:
@razjazjoe wrote:

i meant how do i put s npc beside each portal to let ppl no wat there for

Read full topic

item.title: HELP ME please
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

You don’t have to re add the portals you just have to move the co-ordinates of them

so go into you client.java and Press CTR+F and type “AddGlobalObject” and you should see a whole heap of them. Go on to your client and wherever you want the portals find the co-ordinates (In silab client its in control panel) and change them.

Do that with all you items

Read full topic
